subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: After a 10-year absence and two operations to remove a brain tumor, Todd Demsey finally made it back to the PGA Tour.Demsey, a former N.C.A.A. champion and amateur teammate of Tiger Woods and Phil Mickelson, closed with an eight-under-par 64 in the sixth and final round of Q-school in Winter Garden, Fla., to earn one of 26 full-exempt cards next year in the big leagues.Frank Lickliter, who opened with consecutive 62s, completed a wire-to-wire week at Orange County National and finished as the medalist at 29-under 403. He won by four shots over Brett Rumford of Australia.
